docs.lead_paragraph: THAT time of year is here when slippery walkways become a hazard for millions of older Americans for whom a fall can mean a debilitating and even fatal hip fracture. This year, more than 280,000 Americans will suffer hip fractures. Three-fourths will be women and 87 percent will be 65 or older. For half, the fracture will mean lost independence and a continuing need for nursing-home care or assistance at home.
